website_summaries.verdict: Although some competitors heat better, this pair has a few notable features including touchscreen fingers and warm insulation.
pros: In addition to three heat settings, these gloves have multiple layers for added warmth
cons: The seams aren't very secure and tend to come loose

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality design and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pairs and none of them were satisfactory. The 1st pair charged and heated up but the sitching around the button was poor and I was afraid that it was going to unravel over time. The 2nd pair came in a box that clearly was purchased by another customer and had extra items in the box. The 3rd pair charged but never heated up. The on buttons never lite up. Urg! For this price (~$100 ) you'd think that you could get a well constructed and functioning pair of gloves. I am disappointed since these gloves received over 4 stars on the Amazon reviews. I am not sure why I had such a bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Z.

customer_reviews.title: Hot gloves with very useful heating elements
customer_reviews.text: Nice hot gloves I got to use them over the weekend when it was about 30°, and they kept my hands blazing hot.can't wait to use these when we're in the Minnesota winters at 20 below zero and they keep me warm when I'm out walking the dog or just going for a walk.these both have rechargeable batteries one that you put in each glove that you can pull out. You press the button on the outside and they start heating up within about 20 seconds. Comfortable and warm even without using the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: Mn poet 09

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Needs written instructions
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from skiing at Big Sky. My hands were comfortable and especially appreciated warm fingers in 10 degree weather. I am color blind and like to remind companies that it is hard to tell the difference between red and green. Colors that work are blue, orange\yellow or white. There were no instructions. While I was trying to figure out how they work I peeled off the top layer of protective plastic wrap that I wish I had left alone. Other than these minor suggestions, the gloves were great once I figured them out. Looking forward to a comfortable ski season.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Fingers!
customer_reviews.text: I am an elementary school teacher and I serve outdoor morning car line duty every day. I also have hypothyroidism which makes me very sensitive to cold. When the temperature drops below 40 degrees, I have a very hard time with my hands and feet going numb when I'm outside. My husband bought me these gloves as a Christmas gift. They fit perfectly and deliver warmth to my fingers, not just the palm of my hand. I am able to stay outside for more than half an hour with no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and toasty - batteries heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: They seem great. Only wore them once so far. Started on high temp but quickly realized that it was too hot so switched to low. Only reason for 4 stars was that the batteries are noticeably heavy. Not terrible, and in a pocket on the inside of the wrist is less noticeable. Not a big deal, happy with the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle 57

customer_reviews.title: Impressive warmth!
customer_reviews.text: These heated gloves are amazing. They last a very long time with good warmth and even when turned off retain lots of heat. The tightening strap also holds the gloves tight to fit trapping heat. These have been great during a cold football game and in the deer stand. I would highly recommend these gloves to anyone with poor circulation or who just likes warmth! I can also see these being good for people with arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Discko

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PAIR OF HEATED GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for snow skiing, I used them the 1st time in January 2020 at Big White Ski Resort in Canada, the temps were approx -10C the gloves kept my hands warm on the medium setting for the length of the battery charge life which was approx 5hrs on the medium setting. I would definitely recommend these gloves to anyone based on my experience using them. These gloves run big, I usually wear medium gloves, I had to return the original medium pair I bought and order small to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work as described. The first use I started out with the gloves on high on a hike in mid 20’s winter weather. Within minutes I had to turn down the heat setting. By the time my hour hike was completed I had turned off the gloves because my hands were very warm. Great buy for the money. My gloves came with the batteries fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great heated gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look professionally made. They are made of high quality materials and are better than all the others. I say they are better because they have a larger size battery than others, are cheaper and they fit very well. I will be holding on to these for a wile.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jones

customer_reviews.title: So warm! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for deer opener here in Minnesota. I absolutely LOVED how these gloves worked. The wires go down the fingers so your palm and fingers are warm. I honestly don’t think you need them on a higher setting than low! Only dislike was they were huge on me! I didn’t read anywhere they were men’s gloves.. but they must of been lol!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for winter time motorcycle riding. They fit well, heat well, and work well. I can operate my iphone without taking off the gloves. I recommend this product for winter time motorcycle riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with raynauds
customer_reviews.text: These things are great!! Not only are they warm and water proof, but they warm up really quick!! The battery charger charges both batteries at once!! Will definitely be being more for Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Product takes about 12 to 14 hours to charge. On high setting will last 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Boeing99

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the gloves, I will send an updated review during the North Dakota winter coming soon.
customer_reviews.author: diy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: These were the only gloves I could find small enough to work. They were a gift and she has very small hands, ideally they could be a touch smaller but they work. Nice build quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one battery received
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are nice, I really can’t write a review with only one received battery. Can you send me the second one? I’m only giving a two star because of battery missing. The gloves seem to be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Looking good so far. See what happens when it gets crazy cold
customer_reviews.text: So far with temps in the upper 20s so good. I live in Michigan with temps potentially in negative 20s so time will tell. Good solid gloves even without the heating function so confidence is high.
customer_reviews.author: Fordo

customer_reviews.title: Hope
customer_reviews.text: I work in a freezer warehouse. It seemed like it would have worked perfectly for that type of environment. I got the product but only one of the gloves worked. I found out one of the battery was defective so I ordered a replacement. Hopefully this one works.😔
customer_reviews.author: Peter Williams

customer_reviews.title: Toasty hands
customer_reviews.text: So far gloves are awesome. Very comfortable. Will update when I get more use.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: they don't really get very warm and never warm your fingers. Not very useful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaspman

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable heat in fingers.
customer_reviews.text: There does not appear to be any heat in the fingers or thumb. There is no real noticeable heat in the palm, but by curling up your fingers into the palm when on a chairlift, the fingers don't freeze. Overall, disappointing. They do not seem to be any more effective than good gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Watkins

customer_reviews.title: not like what I expected
customer_reviews.text: after fully charge,doesn't last that long, not stay warm. I had hard time to put it on and take it off. very disappointed on these gloves. have to try something else. not a good product to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use.  Very warm gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great. The battery charging and connectors are straight forward. The heating is great and they have three settings. I’ll have to get used to how bright the light is on the control panel but not an issue. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of a good price and definitely keeps my hands dry and warm. I would have liked to get extra batteries if they were available.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Palonis

customer_reviews.title: Euro Plug
customer_reviews.text: The charger that came withe the batteries is european plug. You will need a converter for the States.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and warm
customer_reviews.text: Super warm gloves they did everything they said they would. But I find them a little bulky for driving horses but they definitely are warm
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly and lasts a long time ! Sizing was spot on ! Great gift for someone
customer_reviews.author: Juantro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: Gloves very warm I cut my thumb off and it was replaced but gets very cold gloves keep my thumb nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: Vern Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Battery life could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life doesn't last anywhere near the 2-3 hrs on high as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Spurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted Two Days
customer_reviews.text: Well, darn it. They worked great for two days of skiing. I plugged them in every evening and if I kept them on low, I got a full day of nice warm hands on the slope. Could it have been better? Yes, it would have been nice if the fronts of my finger tips were warmer. HOWEVER, by the third day, the right glove quit. The battery was fully charged but nothing. I gave it another shot, thinking maybe I had accidentally turned it on the night before and the battery had run out. But that wasn’t it. The glove had quit. Very disappointed and will return.
customer_reviews.author: Barbhe

customer_reviews.title: Hope you will not buy these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this one. I think its a fake chinese one. Not even ETL so do not fall for its UL listed fake. There is no where i could find UL listed, they just claimed themselves. I dont like the smell. Im 5’5” 110lbs skinny asian, and the gloves are M size. Charger is the cheap chinese one. Batteries are 2 times larger in size than the others but have similar capacity instead. Just dont buy it
customer_reviews.author: my thuan

customer_reviews.title: These are what Raynauds suffers dream about having in cold climates.
customer_reviews.text: Riding a motorcycle in the fall time is soooo beautiful, but can be a little chilly at times. I suffer from Raynauds disease, which makes my hands freezing cold even at 70°. Not no more though. With these battery powered heated gloves, i can & will continue riding until mother nature says that's enough and begins to snow. DAMMIT
customer_reviews.author: B.j meade

customer_reviews.title: Great heated gloves to work outside!
customer_reviews.text: Great heated gloves to work outside! , this gloves heat up super quickly and stayed hot for a very long time! easy to charge, great for skiing, work outside in the very cold weather like shoveling snow for example! as we do! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Very Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves will be a welcome edition to my skiing equipment this winter season. My hands started to feel more cold on the slopes lately and I was constantly looking for a reasonable solution for this problem. I noticed that some of my friends had switched to the battery heated gloves and I decided to give it a try. This exceeded my expectations! The gloves are water proof and wind proof. The heating elements hold the temperature for up to 10 hours and batteries do not weight anything at all. The quality of the product is very good. Material is soft with reinforcements in all the right places. I'm one happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: i received the gray ones
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black ones but received the gray ones. the heating control is a little different according to the pictures of the two. but i can confirm the gray ones are great. i would have liked to try out the black ones though
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The best gloves in this category without a doubt!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are working great, easy to use, easy to charge and warm in three different levels (High, Med and Low). The warmth is spread equally to the back of the hand and each finger which gives an overall warm feeling in the entire hand. The glove is perfectly sealed, so heat stays inside. Med and Low are enough to keep a warm hand and gives a long battery life. Altogether perfect product, kept the promise with high quality. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm Hands During Snow Removal is Great!
customer_reviews.text: If your putting up with cold fingers and hands even with the 'best' gloves, you need a pair of these! Easy to charge, to plug in, and to choose a heat setting when wearing. I use them for snow shoveling & with a snow thrower. Great to be warm!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are super nice! As someone with poor circulation, my hands get cold easily in regular gloves during winter. These gloves fix that while still remaining light and easy to move my hands. Charging is simple and the batteries last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Luna

customer_reviews.title: 😭
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was an indication that they were for 240 European outlets. But sizing was perfect Comfort was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Judyb

customer_reviews.title: I will wear them on cold snowy days
customer_reviews.text: The gloves heat up well but they are on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run small
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly slender hands and most Large gloves are a bit roomy for me. These are fairly snug for me. The good news is that I won't be needing glove liners any longer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Toasty hands!
customer_reviews.text: It snowed in Chicago already, and I’m glad I bought these heated gloves. They have good battery life and kept my hands nice and toasty. I’ll be getting some solid use out of them this winter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Smolensky

customer_reviews.title: European Plug
customer_reviews.text: Bad news - Received a power cord with a European plug. Good news - Amazon overnighting a replacement. More bad news - replacement pair also has a European plug. Returning and trying another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Average heated gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves. Lining is loose fit so you have to work your fingers in. Short battery life compared to others I own.
customer_reviews.author: JP Henricksen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, wear in 25 to 40 degree weather. My hands used to ache from the cold, not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McCall

customer_reviews.title: Warm!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Works very well! Heats up fast and heats the fingers and back of hands unlike most only heat the back of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cronen

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow shoveling
customer_reviews.text: I like how my hands were kept warm with no fear of electricution from melting snow or any moisture. They are not too bulky either, you can easily keep moving your fingers. Charges well and does not burn from longterm usage either. Came in a nice black box that I use to store them in once they are dried.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhat

customer_reviews.title: Gloves failed
customer_reviews.text: These gloves do not give any warmth in the palm and fingers! I would not recommend these ever. The batteries were charged and installed properly. When the button was pushed to turn on a bit of heat radiated in the wrist area but did not reach the hand area.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy from Duluth Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Check
customer_reviews.text: Thanks a lot I’m starting enjoy the gloves heating well and nice communication with zero fire management thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used Band-Aid found in glove finger
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product. Don't waste your money. Mine came with a used Band-Aid stuck in the left-hand middle finger. Yuck! Obviously not new. If you don't get yours in the original packing return it immediately. Total hustle!
customer_reviews.author: Clyde W. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome! A must need in Minnesota winters... keep my hands warm and a lithium battery that lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: lucas cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Defective in operation and design.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves did not work -- did not stay on. In addition the heating did not extend to the fingertips. The accompanying paperwork and packaging also demonstrated a lack of quality control. I will try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Andrews

customer_reviews.title: That you have to hold the on button for the 3 seconds it calls for
customer_reviews.text: I used them while I cleaned snow in my yard and had them on for 2 to 4 hrs and they really kept my hands warm on the medium setting. They really look nice and can be worn while working or for dress up with no problem. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: norman wieland

customer_reviews.title: do not heat for long
customer_reviews.text: at 20 above my finger were cold as I snow blowed I got cheaper pair should have got the best pair I could look good on add but not true Ed Spray Spokane wash
customer_reviews.author: Ed Spray

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the work the way it supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to have to return them the battery dies after two hours on low two out of the three times I wore them the third time the right glove didn’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: JERSEY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who is a helicopter pilot and has to have his left hand out in the weather. These gloves fit perfectly and have kept his hands warm during the winter months!
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: Heated coat,gloves,socks
customer_reviews.text: They all work and keep my husband very warm and toasty. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: So far these gloves work great. Heat the hand and fingers. Can set to high, medium or low.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: These gloves work great!
customer_reviews.text: I use them in my electric car to avoid using the heater. They work great and keep my hands toasty warm
customer_reviews.author: Trista Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large. I do not have large men's hands, just medium, but the gloves, marked large on a tag inside the glove, fit like a small. I could hardly close my hand. I returned them using Kohl's. Return credit was via Amazon gift card. Odd as I paid via credit card.
customer_reviews.author: cashley73

customer_reviews.title: Heat
customer_reviews.text: So happy to get these since we will be going to snowy weather
customer_reviews.author: christina b

customer_reviews.title: Batteries difficult to attach/remove
customer_reviews.text: The plugs are very small and very tight, making them difficult to attach and remove. Attaching to the charger is even worse, since the charger plug casing is a bit too big and causes the plug to insert at an angle... which will break over time. Also, the lack of package branding, very poor English, and a company email that uses @hotmail.com makes me wonder. I returned the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pothast

customer_reviews.title: Cuff ripped on second use
customer_reviews.text: The seam in the cuff ripped out on the second use. I’d like to return these but it has been over 30 days since the were shipped by my daughter as a Christmas gift. I asked a question about this but have had no response. This seems to be poor quality for a $100 glove. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer john

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and kept my fingers pretty warm on high in about 35 degree morning on my motorcycle. Only thing I wish was for the sleeve to be a little longer and wider to be able to pull over your jacket /suit sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

product_meta.title: Latest Heated Gloves with 2500 MAH Rechargeable Battery for Men Women, Waterproof Electric Winter Gloves for Skiing, Snowboard, Motorcycle
feature_bullets: 【INTELLGENT HEATING SYSTEM】ZeroFire heated gloves design an integrated heating system strategically placed heating elements use ultra-fine fibers to cover the fingers and thumb so that get optimal heating performance and made with ActiveSoft material that provides lightweight warmth, comfort, and versatility.
【KEEP YOUR HAND WARM】ZeroFire gloves have adjustable cuffs to keep the warmth in and feature 3M Thinsulate insulation for maximum heat retention. No cold and damp are seeping into these babies
【HEATED TIME UP TO 7 HOURS】ZeroFire Electric Heated Gloves create a pair of 7.4V 2500 MAH rechargeable lithium batteries. Heating can last up to 7 hours and can get up to 135F.

【EASY TO USE AND CONTROL】Onboard temperature control button allows easy access to 3 heat settings (High, Middle, Low) providing adjustable warmth. Great for skiing, hiking, hunting, shoveling snow and other work or play activities in a cold environment. Touch Screen Technology on Fingertip

【NO-WORRIES SERVICE】One year warranty. If you have any farther questions or any quality size problems , please contact us by email freely .we will more than happy to assist you ASAP within 24 hours .100% Satisfaction guarantee give yourself and beloved ones a chance to say goodbye to cold hands.
